level.heading: LICENSING OF LCS VEHICLE OPERATORS – INVESTIGATION, EXAMINATION, ANDDUCATION REQUIREMENTS (ยง 31-1208)

level.text: 1208.1 Upon receipt of an application for a license to operate, the Office shall investigate each applicant to verify the identity and determine the competency, fitness, and eligibility of the applicant for a license.
Each applicant shall attend and complete such courses of training and education as the Office requires, and shall successfully pass such tests as the Office requires as conditions for licensing.
